text: Soshite kare-ra wa (sonotame ni) kokoromi (no chōbatsu) ga nai mono to kangaete ita. Sore de kare-ra wa mōmoku ya nanchō-sha to nattaga, sonogo arrā wa, kare-ra no kaigo o yurushi nasareta. Soredemo kare-ra no ōku wa matamo, mizukara mōmoku ya nanchō-sha to natta. Arrā wa kare-ra no okonau tokoro o, gozonji de ara reru
